text: Boris Mikhaylovich Gurevich (also Gurevitch, Gurewitsch, or Hurevych; February 23, 1937 â€“ November 12, 2020) was a Soviet wrestler. He was born in Kyiv, Ukraine. Gurevich won the 1968 Summer Olympic Games freestyle middleweight (191.5 lbs; 82 kilograms) gold medal in Mexico City. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from Kyiv
title: Boris Gurevich (wrestler, born 1937)
